plot: Through personal and disheartening events, and 18-year old and a 10-year old realize they're not alone in having their own silent whispers. By listening, they begin to learn. By learning, they begin to live.
title: Silent Whispers
plot_es: Through personal and disheartening events, and 18-year old and a 10-year old realize they're not alone in having their own silent whispers. By listening, they begin to learn. By learning, they begin to live.
plot_en: Through personal and disheartening events, and 18-year old and a 10-year old realize they're not alone in having their own silent whispers. By listening, they begin to learn. By learning, they begin to live.
